attributes.action: ensure all corrupt Politicians are charged with Fraud/Obtaining money by deception AND sacked!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scandal yet again rocks the Government. Politicians seem to get off criminal charges by apologising and paying back money dishonestly taken from the tax payer. I would be sacked by my employer, prosecuted and placed on the DNA database if I commited an act of Fraud or Obtained Money by Deception. The Law obviously does not apply to Politicians. We want Gordon Brown to find his backbone,sack ALL who are guilty (which would appear to be most)and ensure prosecutions!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
